title: Why do I feel like I'm talking to someone and interacting with someone but there's no one there? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it’s not drug-related; maybe sub-conciously you are craving more of a social environment. Talking to ones self is not at all abnormal though; we all do that now and then. But if the situation is depressing you, just get out and about more often; take a walk and chat to a random stranger… you would be surprised how much difference little things like make. :-) Take care, Anna

There are three possibilities You are having some serious mental issues.There is an angel trying to communicate with you.This is normal. Everyone has imaginative discussions with people in their headIf the 3rd sounds good to you, then start speaking your heart and don’t keep things inside of you. Speak Up
